text: This place is known for big events before Covid strike..And it was closed (for good) for almost 3yrs i guess..Now, the new management has taken over and the Clubhouse has reopened itâ€™s door to all. Greatâ€¦and mind you thereâ€™s LIVE BAND on weekendðŸ˜‰

Went there for lunch on a weekend. Apparently the cafe is closed on the weekdays.. Operates only from Fri to Sun. Food is pretty good and the price is reasonable. Its a nice place to gather for the folks staying in Leisure Farm. For outsiders, it might be difficult to get in as it gated and guarded.
Great facilities such as the field (where we play softball on Sundays), pool. The restaurant has a cosy atmosphere but changes hands very frequently.

The service there is super great the food is soooo dam good credits to the head chef for the great spectacular food and its great to hang out by the pool side and if u want to celebrate any birthday u can do it here.
